sentences.english: Third, his date was dressed as a snake.
sentences.chinese: 第三，他的女伴穿的像条蛇一样。

sentences.english: Nausikaa and her maids play ball.
sentences.chinese: 瑙西卡和她的女伴们在玩球。

sentences.english: Mrs. Yin, our only lady there behaved particularly well, so that we stopped worrying that she wouldl cry.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一的女伴尹工尤为出色，当时真担心她会哭。

sentences.english: Always escort a woman back to her seat after dancing with her.
sentences.chinese: 每次舞毕以后，应但陪送女伴回到她的座位去。

sentences.english: Fulla also has two female friends, Yasmine and Nada, with lighter hair.
sentences.chinese: 芙拉还有两个女伴，雅斯敏和娜达，她们的发色稍浅。

sentences.english: Many unveiled women promenading on the arms of their male friends.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些摘掉面纱的妇女挽着女伴的胳膊散步。

sentences.english: This can be also applied to dress choices for your accompanying girls.
sentences.chinese: 这也完全适用于你的女伴的着衣选择。

sentences.english: A stag at bay is a dangerous foe.
sentences.chinese: 不带女伴的男人在海湾是危险的敌人。

sentences.english: There are many positions the lifting and the lifted partner can take to improve the difficulty of the lift.
sentences.chinese: 男伴和女伴还可以采用不同的姿势来增加托举的难度。

sentences.english: Goro now returns, announcing the arrival of Butterfly and her companions.
sentences.chinese: 五郎回来了，报告大家蝴蝶和女伴们来到。

sentences.english: It's why he never married again, never courted female company.
sentences.chinese: 那就是他一直没有再婚，也没有追求女伴的原因。

definition: partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
to chase women/to express oneself in a pompous flowery style
